descriptionHtml:
Banner provided by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3136685]SvarogNL[/url]Â  ^^ I do not allow for using my recuorces for mods which are being made for profit. I support free mod community

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HxnL2uP.png[/img]

ENDORSE IF YOU LIKE THE MOD. IT MEANS A LOT TO ME

EVIL OVERLORDS TOWER
Is perfect base of operations for evil character. But to get this tower you need to defeat current overlord which is very strong. But even after getting his tower you still need to find his artifacts to get his power as well. Mod is follower freindly since your followers can follow you to you HQ and have their special small bar where you can leave them (I tryed to make this HQ look as much as the Overlord tower from game called Overlord 1)

IMPORTANT!!!
I cannot continue work on this mod cuz lack of time and ideas. So if anyones interested in continuation of this mod please tell me

----------------------------------------------
About Mod Interiors
----------------------------------------------
Tower is made from 5 parts
-Main hall (Portal to Skyrim, Doors to Tresure room, Overlord Quaters and Follower Room)
-Overlord Quaters (Crafting workshops, Werehouse for materials and small garden and shrine)
-Follower Room (Bar where you can leave you followers and sell stolen goods)
-Tresure Room (Mannequins, Weapon and shields displays, book cases and biiiiiig Vault for gold)
-Dungeons (Mostly for decoration since I cant do scripting) They were requested a lot

--------------------------------------------
Mod features
--------------------------------------------
-Quest to take over overlord tower and after that get artifacts to get overlords powers as well (Its not normal quest. You need to follow clues to complete it. You meet first clue when you go to Dragon Reach. Assasin will have the note. Bounty letters with clues to artifacts are located in Whiterun in bannerd mere)

-9 Followers (Demon, Werewolf, Ghost, Assasin, Fanatic and Vampire, Headless Knight, One of your mistresses and Khajit) (IF YOU PLAY AS EVIL CHARACTER)

-14 followers (10 protectors which are very strong, Kuroi Orb, Khajit and headless Eddy plus 1 mistress follower) IF YOU PLAY AS A GOOD CHARACTER

-Snack for vampire in HQ

-Special enchantments in overlord armor (MAY NOT WORK SO SAVE OVERLORD ARMOR)

-Bounty hunting for 16 powerful enemies (Bad guys)

Bounty hunting for 11 Powerfull servants of Overlord but they dont like each other (Good guys)

-Portals to all provinces from the tower once you take it over

-Summon able minions. Best to play with unlimited conjuration mods if you want more than 1 XD

---------------------------------------------
BONUS Dark Orb Underground
---------------------------------------------
Remaked version of Dark Orb Guild mod what makes their base in Blackreach. Its like extra city in Blackreach with few shops and patrols all over the place to protect you. If Dark Orb members die then they wont respawn. So better protect them if you want them to serve you longer (Followers are essential)

-11 Bosses
*Bleakfalls
*Thalmor Embessy
*Behind Whiterun where Bandits camp
*Near Riften. At fort where they keep Pit Wolves
*Markarth underground city
*When you go to dvemer ruins while you wanna get Elder Scroll
*Ratway Vaults
*The place where you learn that Companions are werewolves
*The big cave where Falamer live. Its on Riften territory near Windhelm territory
*??? (In ruins but you have to find out yourself. There are 2 bosses and they the strongest ones)
*???

(Also 5 of the bosses got parts of Assasin outfit (Nightgale outfit but for assasin and sneaky players) and his weapons)

-Many new followers in Blackreach and most of the taverns
-New items
-New spells
-New food
-New shop keepers
-Freindly Blackreach. Now you will have additional patrols to help you there


---------------------------------------------
BONUS esm GreyFaceFix
---------------------------------------------

-It does remove ugly grey faces from my NPC. So follower Khajit for Example will be looking like a tiger now rather than gray cat :) ALso girls in this mods will look a little better. If you have any questions please PM me. Took me a while but I managed to find a good toturial how to avoid grey faces in Skyrim NPC creation

--------------------------------------------------------
Requierments
--------------------------------------------------------
Skyrim 1.4 or better

Best to play with unlimited conjuration (Optional)
I also suggest mods like Wandering Nazguls and Daedric Agents so you wont fell too strong or lonley in this dangerus world

-------------------------------------------------------
Mod History
-------------------------------------------------------
v5
-Version for good players. Overlord tower is cleaner and more pacefull. Still holds everything what evil overlord had
-Added some sigil stones for decoration
-For Evil players there are 11 very strong marks to kill. Every each on lv50 with special amulet and escort so good hunting. Their deatchs will fill vault with gold!!!
-If you play as good guy you have to find and kill your followers from evil version. Thou 11 targets from evil version are now your optional followers (Weaken to be same lv as you now but still with their powers)
-Minions now level up with you so they arent that usless

v4
-Many new Mannequins in Arena Armory added
-Cooking equipment in Overlord Quaters added
-2 more mannequins and Weapon holder for 4 weapons added in Overlord Quaters
-5 Mistresses in Great Hall added (1 of them can be follower)
-Commander Kiba (Follower) in Morthal hold added and his followers (3 but killable followers)
-2 new companions in Crimson Saber Tavern added
-More light and flags added to Tresure room
-More health for Overlord and his artifact holders so no random soldier patrol will kill them
-Bug fix where 2 Artifact holders had Overlords sword

v3
-New NPC in tavern (Still working to make them trainers and bard)
-Adds Battle area (Need scripter to make it more usefull. For now those who like to use console commands may use it for fun)
-Tavern Expanded. Look for secret passage to the garden and area
-Respawin annoying heroes wil occasionaly atack portal to tower
-Loyal Servants will only talk when they battle
-Brighter Tresure room
-Werewolf which was keeper of the Overlord sword and now hunts for thief is killable now (Bug fixed)

V2
-Adds teleports from Overlords tower to every hold in Skyrim
-Adds minion spell
-New Dungeon with few extra NPC for decoration
-Bed size increased in Overlord Quaters
-More flowers in Overlord Quaters
-First Overlord of the tower is stronger. He can summon meteor rain and also can summon Minion (So mages and archers wont kill him so easy)
-Health of all artifacts keepers increased by 300. So no bandit squad can kill him before you do

v1
-Overlord Tower with 4 rooms (Tresure Room, Overlord Quaters, Bar for Followers and Great Hall)
-Total of 8 Unique enemy bosses to defeat
-Overlord Armor set which is very powerfull not for his armor rating but for its multi effects. Good armor for Warriors, mages and Thiefs if you got whole set


Plans for next version (v5 Which will not be released soon since Dawnguard broke my Creation Kit)
-Trainers (I need to learn how to make them work)
-Upgrade of Arena
-Make version of Overlord Tower for Good players as well XD
-Add 10 special targets Heroes to kill with some trophies in form of valulable skulls for Evil version. For good ones those heroes would be followers to collect in Scalet Tavern but you would have to save them from being killed by evil forces

Sugesstions would be appriciated ;) Except those for new interiors. I dont want make tower too big


----------------------------------------------
My requests
---------------------------------------------
-If you like this mod please endorse so I know if its worth to continue. Also more endorsments make it more popular :)

-If anyone wishes doing video of this mod please infrom me :)

-Suggestions how to improve tower are welcome. I make new version when I got more than few suggestions in total. No sense in making new version everytime I add 1 NPC or something like that

-Please report any problems, bugs or conflicts if you find any

-I also look for someone who is good at quest making or scripting things like press a button and traps will work or spawn some monsters on area. For this mod and if possable for my main project. My mod Dark Orb guild needs someone who can make quests. I got whole team except Quest maker and someone who could make 3 items I require


-------------------------------------------------------
Credits
-------------------------------------------------------
Lakword (Me) for doing interiors, NPC, Quest and bounty lists
Chayification for doing video of this mod
And everyone who did give good advice how to imrove this mod

-------------------------------------------------------------
Video of mod
-------------------------------------------------------------
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-bgvw5e5KFY

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HuLHKWdo9KE&feature=plcp


---------------------------------------------------------------
Possable bugs
--------------------------------------------------------------
-If you start this mod when you are high level will make Overlord being killed by Annoying heroes when you arive to Overlord tower
-Grey heads on Khajits and strange head colours on my NPC. I added manual how to fix it ;)


-------------------------------------------------------------
CHEK MY OTHER MODS AS WELL
-------------------------------------------------------------

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18421 Evil Overlord Tower Quest

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17950 Overlord Hideout (Not impresive)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15949 Dark Orb Guild (Flying city. Recruting quest maker)
